pkgmetadata.longdescription: # kgcl-rdflibAn engine that applies changes or diffs specified in KGCL to an RDF graph stored using rdflib## KGCLKGCL (Knowledge Graph Change Language) is a datamodel and language for representing changes in ontologies and knowledge graphsThe core KGCL repo is here: - https://github.com/INCATools/kgcl This kgcl-rdflib repo applies the KGCL model to rdflib graphs.
